repairedDockerfile:
FROM alpine:3.7
MAINTAINER Josh VanderLinden <codekoala@gmail.com>

RUN apk update && \
    apk add --no-cache py-pip && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip && \
    mkdir -p /srv/pypi

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -U passlib pypiserver[cache]==1.2.1

EXPOSE 80
VOLUME ["/srv/pypi"]

ADD entrypoint.sh /
CMD ["/entrypoint.sh"]
